post:
DURING THE MONTH OF OCTOBER, WE ARE OFFERING 50% OFF YOUR FIRST MONTH OF SERVICE! - USE COUPON CODE OCTOBER2010 WHILE ORDERING!

OneNode (http://onenode.net) provides the most reliable and most economical Xen virtual server hosting in the world.

----------------------------

Why Choose Us?

  • Robust, secure, and efficient Xen para-virtualization platform
  • High volume bw w/ Gigabit uplink ports
  • All legal content allowed (incl. IRC, VPN, proxies)
  • Free native IPv6 ranges
  • Instant reboot/reload + monitoring
  • Free, Instant setup
  • Aggressive Uptime SLA
  • World-class East Coast USA Datacenter

And much, much more...

----------------------------

Plans

We have servers available to fit any need or budget. Custom plans can be arranged; contact sales -at- onenode.net for details.

VPS256 - Only $4.98 for the first month!

256MB RAM
256MB Swap
25GB storage
1TB monthly bandwidth
1 CPU Core
1 IP address

Order now!

----------------------------

Upgrades/Options

Software:
cPanel/WHM - $14/mo
DirectAdmin - $14/mo
Clients are welcome to use self-owned licenses

Extra IPv4 IPs:
Extra IPv4 IPs are billed at $1/month each. ARIN justification may be requested at our discretion.

Additional Bandwidth:
100GB - $2

Operating Systems

Available operating systems include (32 bit and 64 bit):

  • CentOS 5.4, 5.5
  • Debian 5.0
  • Fedora 12, 13
  • Ubuntu 8.04, 8.10, 9.04, 10.04
  • Gentoo 2008, 2010
  • Slackware 12.2 (32bit only), 13

----------------------------

Datacenter, Network, & Test IP/Files

Datacenter: Uber Center in Asheville, North Carolina, USA

Network: We have a premium BGP mix with connectivity to over 15 providers right now. All bandwidth is optimized by our Internap Flow Control Platform (FCP) for performance based routing only to ensure the absolute best path from the datacenter to the end-user.

Our current providers include: AT&T, Global Crossing, Qwest, Telia, Time Warner, Sprint, AboveNet, Charter, Nuvox, BTN/PCCW, WBS Connect, Comcast, ERC, Level (3), and Savvis.

Test IP: 216.59.6.85
Test File: 100MB Test File

----------------------------

FAQ

Our full FAQ can be found at our site: http://onenode.net/faq.php

How long will it take for my server to be setup?

Server setup is instant pending an automatic fraud check.

What am I allowed to host on my server?

It's probably easier to tell you what we don't allow: Nothing illegal and nothing that interferes with other customers and services. In short, if it's legal it's probably allowed. Please read through our AUP and TOS for necessary clarification.

What payment methods do you accept?

We offer payments from PayPal balance, AlertPay, and all major credit cards through PayPal.

----------------------------

Have any questions? Don't hesitate to post them here or email us:

Support/General inquiries: support -at- onenode.net
Sales: sales -at- onenode.net
